name: Ahmed Ali
text: YA SIN.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I call to witness the Qur'an, custodian of all laws, --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That you are indeed one of those sent

name: Ahmed Ali
text: On a path that is straight, --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: A revelation from the mighty, ever-merciful (God),

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That you may warn a people whose ancestors had never been warned, who are therefore heedless.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The sentence is surely justified against most of them, for they do not believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We will certainly put iron collars on their heel's which will come up to their chins, so that they will not be able to raise their heads.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We shall raise a barrier in front of them and a barrier behind them, and cover them over so that they will not be able to see.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Whether you warn them or do not warn, it is all the same; they will not believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You can only warn him who listens to the warning and fears Ar-Rahman secretly. So give him good news of forgiveness and a generous reward.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It is We indeed who bring back the dead to life, and write down what they send ahead (of their deeds), and traces that they leave behind. We keep an account of all things in a lucid register.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Narrate to them the example of the people of the city when the messengers came to it.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When We sent two of them they called them liars; so We sent a third to strengthen them. "We have been sent to you," they said.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "You are only men like us," they replied; "Ar-Rahman has not sent down any thing. You are speaking only lies."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (The messengers) said: "Our Lord knows that we have been sent to you.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Our duty is to convey the message clearly."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They rejoined: "We feel you augur ill. If you do not desist, we shall stone you to death, and inflict a grievous punishment on you."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (The messengers) said: "The augury is within your own selves. Do you (consider it a bad omen) that you should be warned? You are a people guilty of excess."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then a man came running from the other side of the city. "O my people," he said, "follow the messengers.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Follow those who do not ask for any recompense of you, and are rightly guided.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Why should I not worship Him who brought me into being, to whom you will be brought back in the end?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Should I take other gods apart from Him, who would neither be able to intercede for me nor save me if Ar-Rahman brings me harm?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: In that case I would surely be in clear error.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I believe in your Lord, so listen to me."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (But they stoned him to death.) It was said to him: "Enter Paradise;" and he said: "If only my people knew

name: Ahmed Ali
text: How my Lord has forgiven me and made me one of those who are honoured!"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We did not send down any army against his people from heaven, nor did We have to send one.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: There was just one blast, and they were extinguished.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Alas for men! No apostle ever came to them but they made fun of him.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Have they not seen how many generations have We destroyed before them who will not return again?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will all be brought together before Us.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: There is a sign in the dead earth for them which We quicken, and produce from it grain which they eat.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have laid out gardens of dates and grapes upon it, and made springs of water flow,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So that they may eat of its fruit; yet it was not done by their hands. Then why do they not acknowledge thanks?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: All glory to Him who created pairs of everything that grows from the earth, and out of themselves, and other things they do not know.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And there is a sign in the night for them. We strip off the day from it and they are left in darkness,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: While the sun keeps revolving in its orbit. This is the dispensation of the mighty, all-knowing (God).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have determined the stations of the moon, so that (after its wanderings) it returns as a dried up inflorescent spike of dates.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Neither can the sun overtake the moon, nor the night outpace the day: Each of them keeps coursing in its orbit.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That We bore their progeny in the laden ark is a sign for them;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We made similar vessels for them to ride.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We could have drowned them if We pleased, and none would have answered their cry for help, nor would they have been saved,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Unless by Our benevolence, to reap advantage for a time.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When it is said to them: "Beware of what is before you and what is past, that you may be treated with kindness;"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: None of the signs of their Lord ever comes to them but they turn away from it.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When they are told: "Spend of what God has given you," the unbelievers say to those who believe: "Why should we feed those whom God should have fed if He pleased?" You are only in palpable error.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And they say: "When will this promise come to pass, if what you say is true?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They are only waiting for a single blast that will seize them, but they will go on contending.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then they would not be able to make a will, or go back to their people.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When the trumpet blast is sounded they will come out of their graves and hasten to their Lord,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Saying: "Ah woe, who has roused us from our sleep?" This is what Ar-Rahman had promised, and whose truth the apostles had affirmed.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It would be but a single blast of the trumpet, and they would all be arraigned before Us.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: No soul will be wronged the least that Day, nor would be recompensed but only for what it had done.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Surely the inmates of Paradise will be engaged in pastimes.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They and their companions will recline on couches in the shade.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: For them will be fruits and whatever they ask.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Peace" shall be the greeting from the merciful Lord.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (And the guilty will be told:) "O sinners, separate yourselves this day.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Did I not commit you, O children of Adam, not to worship Satan who is your acknowledged foe,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But to serve Me; (that) this is the straight path?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But he beguiled a great many of you. Why did you not then understand?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This is the Hell that you were promised.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Roast in it now for having disbelieved."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We shall seal their lips that day; and their hands will speak, their feet testify to what they had done.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We could take away their sight if We pleased; then they would run around to find the way: But how then would they see?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And if We pleased We could paralyse them in their tracks, and they would not be able to move forward or turn back.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Whoever reaches old age, We reverse in natural disposition. Do they not have sense (to see)?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have not taught (Muhammad) to versify, nor is it worthy of him. This is nothing but a reminder and illuminating discourse,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So that he may warn him who is alive and feels, and justify the word against those who do not believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Do they not see the cattle among things We have fashioned by Our power, which they own,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Whom We made subservient to them so that some of them they ride and some they eat?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And they derive other advantages and drinks from them. Even then they do not offer thanks,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And take other gods apart from God that they may perhaps give them help.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will not be able to help them and will be brought (to Us) as their levied troops.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So be not grieved by what they say. We certainly know what they hide and disclose.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Does not man see We created him from a drop of semen? Even then he becomes an open contender,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And applies comparisons to Us, having forgotten his origin, and says: "Who can put life into decayed bones?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Say: "He who created you the first time. He has knowledge of every creation,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Who gave you fire from a green tree, with which you ignite the flame."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: How can He who created the heavens and the earth not be able to create others like them? Why not? He is the real creator all-knowing.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When He wills a thing He has only to say: "Be," and it is.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So all glory to Him who holds all power over everything, to whom you will go back in the end.
